# inputImage

**Instance Property**

The image to use as an input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **levels**: The number of brightness levels to use for each color component.

items.description: The number of brightness levels to use for each color component.
